import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = ()=>{ const [data,setData] = useState({ fullname:'', phone:'', email:'', msg:'' }); const Form_handing = (event)=>{ const {name,value} = event.target; console.log(name); console.log(value); } const Form_submit = (event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); } return( <>
); } export default Contact;
